ArmidaleClass.name: armidale.api.gui.BorderPanel
ArmidaleClass.documentation:
A BorderPanel is a panel on which widgets are layed out using a border layout manager. See the JDK description of java.awt.BorderLayout for more details.
This is a second paragraph

attribute.name: horizontalGap
attribute.documentation: The horizontalGap attribute specifies the horizontal gap between widgets placed on the BorderPanel

attribute.name: verticalGap
attribute.documentation: The verticalGap attribute specifies the vertical gap between widgets placed on the BorderPanel

list.name: widget
list.documentation: A widget is added to a BorderPanel by first encapsulating it in a BorderPanelWidget and then adding the BorderPanelWidget to the BorderPanel using the addWidget method. Widgets are removed using the removeWidget or removeAllWidgets methods.
